title: Step 27

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-right-ear selector should have a position property set to absolute. Don't forget to add a semi-colon.
Your .cat-right-ear selector should have a top property set to -26px
Your .cat-right-ear selector should have a left property set to 163px

description: Move the right ear into position with a position property set to absolute, a top of -26px, and a left of 163px.
